rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Area
rooms.description: A spacious entrance leading to an open-plan living area with Bohemian decor including eclectic art pieces, vibrant textiles, and handcrafted furniture. The space is designed to welcome energy according to Vastu by keeping the main entrance oriented towards the east.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated home office located near the living area for easy access, featuring a desk with ample natural light from north-facing windows. The office space incorporates minimalist Bohemian design with vintage accessories that promote concentration and creativity.

rooms.name: Kitchen & Dining
rooms.description: A modern kitchen open to the dining area, designed in a Bohemian style with colorful backsplashes and decorative tiles. The kitchen is arranged following Vastu principles by ensuring that it's placed in the southeast region of the villa.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom & Utility
rooms.description: A compact guest bathroom and utility area designed for efficient use, incorporating Bohemian elements like mosaic tiles and unique fixtures.

openings.location: North wall in the home office
East and West walls of living area

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The primary bedroom with ample natural light and Bohemian-inspired decor. Positioned in the north-west to align with Vastu for calmness and prosperity.

rooms.name: Studio Area
rooms.description: A versatile studio space that can be used as a creative workspace or relaxation area, designed with flexible furniture and vibrant Bohemian accents.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: An ensuite bathroom attached to the master bedroom, featuring modern fixtures and decorative tiles in a Bohemian style.

openings.location: Between Master Bedroom and Studio Area
